label: BB001_01
name: Problem formulation
description: Enter a description of the problem formulation, including a clear assessment question

label: BB002_01
name: Relevant existing data
description: Search for available data about this compound in existing data sources (see suggested links)

label: DP01EF_01
name: Is the information sufficient?
description: Justify if existing data is sufficient for answering the question posed in the Problem Formulation

label: BB014_01
name: Generate in silico predictions of hazard
description: Apply a battery of in silico methods for relevant hazard

name: Alert for genotoxicity, skin irritation or sensitization?
description: Search for alerts in the structure associated to skin irritation or sensitization

name: Defined approaches or dedicated test to confirm or characterize alert
description: Alerts detected in the previous step should be confirmed by applying in vitro or in silico approaches, like the ones we suggest in our links

name: Is the information sufficient?
description: Justify if existing data is sufficient for answering the question posed in the Problem Formulation

name: Is read-across applicable?
description: Justify in the application of read-accross can answer the question posed in the Problem Formulation

label: BB015_01
name: Generate HT in vitro data
description: Apply Hight-Throughput transcriptomics

label: BB016_01
name: Integration of results
description: Integrate the results obtained so far by different methods, identifying the most important conclusions, related with the Problem Formulation

name: Generate NAM data based on read-across hypothesis
description: Use the hypothesis obtained by read-across to design NAM test

label: BB016_01
name: Integration of results
description: Analyze and integrate the results obtained in previous steps

name: Are ADME properties of substance of interest known?
description: Justify if the ADME information about the substance of interest is sufficient

label: BB008_01
name: Generate basic set of ADME data
description: Apply suitable in vitro methods for estimating the toxico kinetics parameters that can were considered to have the highest priority.
